backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a library management system with book CRUD, borrow/return records, user profiles, and role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference for the project's frontend architecture and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file importing Tailwind layers and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, charts, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the VEMU Library Portal SPA, mounting the React app at the `#root` div and loading `src/main.tsx` as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up React Query, TanStack Router with routes for landing, login, signup, student dashboard, and admin dashboard, wrapped in theme and auth providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddBookMod: Admin-only dialog form for adding a new book to the library catalog, with field validation and error handling via the useAddBook mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/BorrowReco: Admin tab that displays all borrow records in a searchable, filterable table with status badges (active, returned, overdue) derived from fetched records and book data.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManageBook: Admin tab component for viewing, searching, and deleting library books in a table, with an 'Add Book' modal available to admin users.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManageUser: Admin tab component that displays all registered users in a searchable table showing name, email, principal, role, and join date.
frontend/src/components/admin/OverviewTa: Admin dashboard overview tab showing animated stat cards for total books, users, borrowed books, overdue books, and a live online member count for admins.
Reusable React component that animates a number from 0 to a target value using requestAnimationFrame with cubic ease-out easing.
frontend/src/components/BookCatalog.tsx: Book catalog component with search and category filtering, a responsive grid of book cards, and borrow functionality with loading and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/BorrowedBooksLis: Tabbed component displaying a user's active borrows and borrow history, with overdue detection, date formatting, and return-book functionality with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick navigation links, contact details, and a copyright line with a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar that shows role-aware links (admin vs. user vs. guest), a theme toggle, logout button, and a collapsible mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects a new user's name and email on first login and saves the profile via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to /login and enforces optional role-based access, showing a spinner while the session initializes.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Small icon button that toggles between light and dark themes using the ThemeContext, displaying a Sun or Moon icon accordingly.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: React context that manages user authentication state including role, principal, and logout, persisting values to localStorage and fetching the role from the backend actor.
frontend/src/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx: React context providing light/dark theme state with toggle functionality, persisting the selected theme to localStorage and applying it to the document root.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing identity, login/clear functions, and login status to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile/role fetching, book CRUD operations, and borrow/return actions using the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes including navy, gold, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page with a collapsible sidebar for navigating between Overview, Manage Books, Manage Users, and Borrow Records tabs, guarded by role check.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page featuring a hero section with a background video, animated stats counters, and a features grid promoting the VEMU library system.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity, fetches their role after login, and redirects to the admin or user dashboard accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Sign-up page that authenticates users via Internet Identity, fetches their role from the backend, and redirects them to the admin or student dashboard accordingly. Displays a step-by-step onboarding UI with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student dashboard page with a tabbed layout containing a book catalog (browse) tab and a borrowed books tab, along with a personalized welcome header using the caller's profile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL query parameters from both regular and hash-based routes, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Playfair Display, Inter), OKLCH-based color tokens (navy, gold, semantic colors), custom shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes for accordion, fade-in, and slide-in effects.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 21) describing the VEMU Library Portal's implemented features, known issues (admin session persistence, deployment failure), and architectural notes for a full-stack ICP-based web app.
